detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft organic slub cotton jersey with a frill trim at the top and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Buttons at the back, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (sizes 1-4Y with no press-studs), and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. A-line dress in soft, textured-knit organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the back, side pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy, patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons and flounces at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in an airy, patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons and flounces at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a pair of trousers and long-sleeved top in a double layer of organic cotton jersey. Top with a button at the neck and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in rib-knit organic cotton with a turned-up, appliquéd hem.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in rib-knit organic cotton with a turned-up, appliquéd hem.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on the shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on the shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Loose-fitting, short-sleeved blouse in a textured viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders with decorative gathers, a gathered yoke at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Loose-fitting, short-sleeved blouse in a textured viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders with decorative gathers, a gathered yoke at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Blouse in a soft, patterned weave with short, wide raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Blouse in a soft, patterned weave with short, wide raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Oversized shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with woven stripes. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut hem and long slits in the sides.
Trenchcoat woven in a soft viscose blend with notch lapels and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets with a taped zip, and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
V-neck body in airy jersey with a slight sheen. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and gentle draping at the front. Seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a fleece-lined, drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with a pleat and button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Lined.
